content:
Sheet masks are a great way to give your skin an intense dose of hydration and brightening benefits. Here are some popular sheet masks that fit your requirements:

**Hydration:**

1. **Laneige Water Bank Hydrating Mask** ($6): This mask provides long-lasting hydration and helps to plump up fine lines and wrinkles.
2. **Dr. Jart+ Water-Replenishing Mask** ($6): This mask is infused with hyaluronic acid and green tea extract to provide intense hydration and soothe dry skin.
3. **Innisfree It's Real Squeeze Mask - Hydrating** ($2): This affordable mask is made with green tea extract and hyaluronic acid to provide hydration and nourishment to dry skin.

**Brightening:**

1. **Dr. Jart+ Brightening Infusion Mask** ($6): This mask contains niacinamide and vitamin C to help brighten and even out skin tone.
2. **SK-II PITERA Essence Mask** ($10): This mask is infused with PITERA, a proprietary ingredient that helps to brighten and firm the skin.
3. **Missha Time Revolution Brightening Mask** ($6): This mask contains vitamin C and niacinamide to help brighten and improve skin elasticity.

**Hydration + Brightening:**

1. **Tony Moly I'm Real Mask Sheet - Hyaluronic Acid & Vitamin C** ($3): This mask provides both hydration and brightening benefits, thanks to the combination of hyaluronic acid and vitamin C.
2. **The Face Shop Real Nature Mask - Hydrating & Brightening** ($2): This mask is infused with green tea extract and vitamin C to provide hydration and brightening benefits.
3. **Neogen Dermatologist's Remedy Barrier Repair Mask** ($6): This mask provides hydration and brightening benefits while also helping to repair and strengthen the skin's barrier function.

These are just a few examples of the many amazing sheet masks out there. You can't go wrong with any of these options, but feel free to explore and find the one that suits your skin type and concerns the best!
